subject: Re: The AAF - pdwise DNS + Connect
preview: Hi Dimitri,  Confirming all the forms are now connected to pdwise.

full_threads.body:
Hi Dimitri,

Confirming all the forms are now connected to pdwise.

Hi Heath,

Can you please make sure the 'Active Kids' & 'Contact Us' forms are also
connected to pdwise. Essentially ALL FORMS on the domain, need to be
connected to pdwise.

Can you do this as a matter of urgency and confirm once completed.

Thanks,
Dimitri

Hi Dimitri,

Confirming the "BOOK A FREE SESSION" form on homepage is now setup. We have turned off the "Funnel" mailchimp on this page. https://www.theaaf.com.au/wp-admin/admin.php?page=vxcf_mailchimp

Hi Dimitri,

We have updated the DNS records.
We will get back to you on the forms.



How would you rate my reply?
Great

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Dimitri,

We have updated the DNS records.
We will get back to you on the forms.

@heath Can you help me with the DNS update for theaaf?



TXT RECORD

Host: krs._domainkey.mail.theaaf.com.au
Required Value: k=rsa; p=MIGfMA0GCSqGSIb3DQEBAQUAA4GNADCBiQKBgQC42ujc79nF42A7Nf0/kVFBL3pXl0LxDI811Tevf4OTtZLNtqGN2ODv71vn16g+LTTdJyKr4x/nkZKiDGzP6xiWqap+p48uxwWw1kqlULpLvD7iU/rUZZhYVeATAVfTHse/hhwG3MHvxM0GVOzO6OoiwsNjVUcsMPISrxr2Fe7anwIDAQAB

TXT RECORD


Host: mail.theaaf.com.au
Required Value: v=spf1 include:mailgun.org ~all

CNAME RECORD


Host: email.mail.theaaf.com.au
Required Value: mailgun.org

MX RECORD


Host: mail.theaaf.com.au
Required Value: mxa.mailgun.org

MX RECORD (TTL 400)


Host: mail.theaaf.com.au
Required Value: mxb.mailgun.org

Please advise one these records are added on your end.

Hi Joel,

I understand however can you at least update the DNS records for me as a starting point and then keep me posted on the form/site update?

Thanks,
Dimitri

Dimitri Galanis
Director & Strategist

T: (02) 9171 4990 | M: 0419 707 061

Hi Dimitri,

Sorry for the delay,
We are currently working on it staging, The site is using a different form so we need to make changes to the script and make sure that it is compatible with the functions.

Hi Team,

I really need an update with this please.

Regards,
Dimitri

Hi Dimitri,

We are looking into this. We will give you an update later today.

Hi Team,

Can I get an update on this? Also do you need the API KEY?

Thanks,
Dimitri

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Team,

Further to the above, we kindly request that your team link the "Book A
Free Trial" form which potential parents complete on the homepage of
https://www.theaaf.com.au/ to pdwise. We have already set-up custom fields
for each of the questions within pdwise + a tag which is 'New Lead'. Please
disconnect the existing form from MailChimp/Hubspot integrations if you
find any as pdwise should be the only 3rd party platform connected.

Can you do this urgently so we can ensure all leads are falling into
pdwise?

Thanks,
Dimitri

Hi Heath & Team,

Can we kindly add the following records to the DNS of theaaf.com.au so that we can set-up their pdwise account.



TXT RECORD

Host: krs._domainkey.mail.theaaf.com.au
Required Value: k=rsa; p=MIGfMA0GCSqGSIb3DQEBAQUAA4GNADCBiQKBgQC42ujc79nF42A7Nf0/kVFBL3pXl0LxDI811Tevf4OTtZLNtqGN2ODv71vn16g+LTTdJyKr4x/nkZKiDGzP6xiWqap+p48uxwWw1kqlULpLvD7iU/rUZZhYVeATAVfTHse/hhwG3MHvxM0GVOzO6OoiwsNjVUcsMPISrxr2Fe7anwIDAQAB

TXT RECORD

Host: mail.theaaf.com.au
Required Value: v=spf1 include:mailgun.org ~all

CNAME RECORD

Host: email.mail.theaaf.com.au
Required Value: mailgun.org

MX RECORD

Host: mail.theaaf.com.au
Required Value: mxa.mailgun.org

MX RECORD (TTL 400)

Host: mail.theaaf.com.au
Required Value: mxb.mailgun.org

Please advise one these records are added on your end.

Thanks,
Dimitri

Dimitri Galanis
